    Data Streaming

    Time Concepts in Data Streaming

    Senthil Nayagan           
     Jul 21, 2022 -  0 Mins Read
    • data-engineering
    • data-management
    • data-streaming

    Writing in progress: If you have any suggestions for improving the content or notice any inaccuracies, please email me at hello@senthilnayagan.com. Thanks!

    Timestamps, particularly event-times, are significant aspects of any data streaming application. The entity that produces events sets the timestamp as part of the event itself.
